ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( ( abs ` N ) = N -> ( ( abs ` N ) gcd M ) = ( N gcd M ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( abs ` N ) = N -> ( ( abs ` N ) gcd M ) = ( N gcd M ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_neggcd | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( -u N gcd M ) = ( N gcd M ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( ( abs ` N ) = -u N -> ( ( abs ` N ) gcd M ) = ( -u N gcd M ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( abs ` N ) = -u N -> ( ( ( abs ` N ) gcd M ) = ( N gcd M ) <-> ( -u N gcd M ) = ( N gcd M ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( abs ` N ) = -u N -> ( ( abs ` N ) gcd M ) = ( N gcd M ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_zre | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. RR ) |
